titleStmt.title: Scriptures opened and sundry cases of conscience resolved, in plain and practical answers to several questions, upon the proverbs of Solomon, Ecclesiastes, Jeremiah, Lamentations, Ezekiel, and Daniel / by that faithful servant of Jesus Christ, William Thomas ...
titleStmt.author: Thomas, William, 1593-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Sampson Evans, Bookseller in Worcester,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn, and tightly bound, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in: Congregational Library (London, England)
